page.title: 01THE GENERAL AREA
page.content:
Our area of land stretches from the{Old Dean Common}to the{Lightwater {Country Park .}It is mostly heathland although there is one main built up place{Bagshot.
The land around{Bagshot}is called {Bagshot Heath.} Trees on{Bagshot Heath are mostly coniferous although there are some areas of mixed forest.
There is a large{motorway}called the{M3}which runs close to{ Bagshot. This links{London}with{Winchester. There is another road which runs through{Bagshot.} It is called the {A30. This connects{London}with the{West {Country.
